Naive sparse matrix-\/vector computation.  


{\ttfamily \#include $<$stdio.\-h$>$}\\*
{\ttfamily \#include $<$stdlib.\-h$>$}\\*

{\ttfamily \#include $<$poski/poski\-\_\-test.\-h$>$}\\*
\subsection*{Functions}

int \hyperlink{poski__Test__NaiveSpMV_8c_a3c148c6f6edd1b8059720b28d87ef9ee}{poski\-\_\-\-Navie\-Mat\-Mult\-C\-S\-R} (poski\-\_\-sparse\-\_\-matrix\-\_\-t $\ast$A, poski\-\_\-value\-\_\-t alpha, poski\-\_\-value\-\_\-t $\ast$x, poski\-\_\-value\-\_\-t beta, poski\-\_\-value\-\_\-t $\ast$y, poski\-\_\-operation\-\_\-t op)
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Naive sparse matrix-\/vector computation (Sp\-M\-V). \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
Naive sparse matrix-\/vector computation. This module implements the routines to handle naive sparse matrix-\/vector computations.

\begin{DoxyAttention}{Attention}
Currently, only support with C\-S\-R format.
\end{DoxyAttention}
Also, refer \hyperlink{poski__TestHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Test\-Handler.\-c}
